形.definition: to appear; to look; form; shape

形勢嚴峻.definition: in grave difficulties; the situation is grim

形同虛設.definition: to exist in name only; empty shell; useless (idiom)

形婚.definition: sham marriage, esp. a marriage between a gay man and a lesbian arranged in response to parental expectations of a conventional marriage (abbr. for 形式婚姻[xing2 shi4 hun1 yin1])

形式.definition: outer appearance; form; shape; formality; CL:個|个[ge4]

形形色色.definition: all kinds of; all sorts of; every (different) kind of

形影相弔.definition: with only body and shadow to comfort each other (idiom); extremely sad and lonely

形影相隨.definition: lit. body and shadow follow each other (idiom); fig. inseparable

形成層.definition: vascular cambium (layer of tissue responsible for growth inside wood)

形於色.definition: to show one's feelings; to show it in one's face

形旁.definition: semantic component of a phono-semantic character (e.g. component 刂[dao1] in 刻[ke4])

形神.definition: body and soul; physical and spiritual; material form and internal spirit

形符.definition: semantic component of a phono-semantic character (e.g. component 刂[dao1] in 刻[ke4])

形聲.definition: ideogram plus phonetic (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters); also known as phonogram, phonetic compound or picto-phonetic character

形色.definition: shape and color; appearance; facial expression

形譯.definition: derivation of a Chinese loanword from Japanese by using the same characters (or variants) but applying Chinese pronunciation (e.g. 場合|场合[chang3 he2], derived from Japanese 場合, pronounced "ba'ai")

形象.definition: image; form; figure; CL:個|个[ge4]; visualization; vivid

形象代言人.definition: (brand or organization) ambassador; face (of a brand or company)

形象大使.definition: person who represents an organization and enhances its image; an ambassador

形跡.definition: manner; bearing; trace; mark; trail; etiquette
